message: 1、修复V4.0.1版本卡片被误删的bug||2、支持Android 7.0以上磁贴(Quick setting tile)快捷模拟卡片(支持单击、双击和长按)||3、支持模拟或还原卡片时，如果NFC没有开启，会先开启NFC再进行模拟或还原卡片||4、修复部分系统模拟卡片失败的bug(system或者vendor分区不可读写)||注意：从4.0.1版本起，移除了Google广告，部分功能加了限制，但不影响基本使用，如果你无法接受，请不要更新，继续使用旧版即可。（你可以购买专业版来解锁这些受限制的功能，促进开发者继续开发和维护下去，使更多人能用上）
message_en: 1、Fix the cards will be lost bug in 4.0.1 version||2、Support Android 7.0 quick setting tile to simulate card(support click、double click and long press)||3、Support before simulate or restore card will turn on the nfc if nfc is turn off.||4、Fix some phones simuate card failed bug（system or vendor partition is locked）||Notice: From 4.0.1 version above, the Google ad is removed, but some function are limited, if you don't like this, just don't update it and keep use the old version. (You can buy the pro version to unlock the limit)
